ygData.subject: RE: Dual Bard Invisibility Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are you sure?  You become visible when you start a new song, so you can t weave Hymn and invis and stay invisible. Dunno about the other case (two bards in
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> I noticed this two, even more strangely I was able to weave healing and
> invis and still not be seen. It could be there are some mobs which cannot
> see thru invis that can see you when the song pulses. I was definitely able
> healing without activating it. The mob I tested on was a gnoll reaver in

Are you sure? You become visible when you start a new song,
so you can't weave Hymn and invis and stay invisible.

Dunno about the other case (two bards in party, singing Hymn
and invis). I never tested that.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
